biography:
Gordon Lam Ka-tung (Chinese: 林家棟, born 21 September 1967) is a Hong Kong actor known for his supporting roles in films from the likes of Andrew Lau to Johnnie To.

Description above from the Wikipedia article Gordon Lam, licensed under CC-BY-SA, full list of contributors on Wikipedia.
name: Gordon Lam
place_of_birth: Hong Kong, British Crown Colony [now China]
